righthandWords.words: some big hotels in the town.|any cafes near the station?|post office in the square?|nice restaurant in Victoria Street.|a car park in Market Street.|any cinemas in this town.|a good supermarket in this street?|parks near the square?|quiet places in the park.|stop near the station.
